subject: Economics
title: Tax Havens: Where the World's Wealth Hides
description: Learn Tax Havens: Where the World's Wealth Hides in one minute.

hook.text: An estimated $36 trillion sits in offshore tax havens.

buildup.text: Tax havens offer near-zero tax rates and total secrecy.

discovery.text: Gabriel Zucman estimated that 8% of the world's financial wealth is held offshore.

twist.text: Tax havens aren't just tropical islands.

climax.text: Tax havens make inequality worse by ensuring that the wealthiest pay the least.

punchline.text: The richest people in the world are also the hardest to tax.

quiz.question: How much of the world's financial wealth is estimated to be held offshore?
